Name: WinStrip
Description: Version checks improved and export and import themes is now possible.

NewFeatures.Title: Version check improved
NewFeatures.Description: Version checks can compare now compare major.minor.patch.build.  Older version could only compare version strings that had only major.minor parts.

NewFeatures.Title: Export themes
NewFeatures.Description: User can now export his themes allowing him to save them or share with others.

NewFeatures.Title: Import themes
NewFeatures.Description: User can now import themes from other users.
